attributes.action: Save Britannia on our 50 Pence Coin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia is a symbol of our Britishness. It is important to the people of this great Country and we want to keep it. Britannia represents British liberties and democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
